name: RevRec Contract Modifications Automation
pain_points: Modifications manually tracked → high risk of ASC 606 error

name: Revenue Forecast Source-of-Truth Alignment
pain_points: Forecast data inconsistent with actuals, manual reconciliations required

name: Consumption Billing Minimum Handling
pain_points: Billing disputes caused by minimum charge misinterpretation

name: Deferred Revenue Reporting Standardization
pain_points: Region-specific views, inconsistent definitions confuse auditors

name: Billing Dispute Analytics
pain_points: No systematic trend analysis, recurring dispute types unclear

name: SKU Lifecycle Governance
pain_points: Orphaned SKUs and inconsistent mapping create accounting errors

name: Sales Order Pre-Validation Service
pain_points: High number of downstream corrections due to missing required metadata

name: Tax Jurisdiction Data Quality Program
pain_points: Incorrect tax mapping → invoice errors + customer credits

name: Invoice Email Delivery Tracking
pain_points: Customers claim non-receipt → delays in payment and DSO
